backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor with authorization and storage mixins plus comprehensive resident‑related types and comparison utilities.
backend/migration.mo: Implements migration module containing legacy-compatible types and a no-op run function that returns existing state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a dashboard UX feature to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of various frontend files including routing, dialogs, hooks, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme definitions providing OKLCH color variables, light/dark themes, and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document bootstrapping the React application through the root div and main.tsx entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application router and authentication flow handling identity, resilient actor loading, profile setup, and route rendering.
frontend/src/components/AddAdlRecordDial: Dialog form for creating ADL records with required fields, validation, date conversion, and submission via React Query.
frontend/src/components/AddDailyVitalsDi: Dialog component that collects vital sign inputs, validates required fields, converts values, and submits a new daily vitals record for a resident.
frontend/src/components/AddMarRecordDial: Form dialog for selecting an active medication and submitting a new MAR record with administration details.
frontend/src/components/AddMedicationDia: UI dialog that captures medication details, parses administration times, resolves prescribing physician, and submits a new medication for a resident.
frontend/src/components/AddResidentDialo: Large multi-section form for entering full resident information, including physicians, pharmacy, insurance, responsible persons, and medications.
frontend/src/components/AddWeightEntryDi: Dialog for recording a resident’s weight measurement, converting date input, validating fields, and submitting a weight entry.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Component that displays the brand logo with size and mode options, falling back to text if the image fails to load.
frontend/src/components/EditMedicationDi: Modal form for editing a resident’s medication and submitting updates via mutateAsync.
frontend/src/components/EditResidentDial: Large modal form for editing all resident details including physicians, pharmacy, insurance, responsible persons, and medications.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Simple profile setup form that saves the caller’s name, role, and employee ID.
frontend/src/components/ResidentPhotoUpl: Empty placeholder component with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/StartupErrorScre: Displays startup errors with diagnostics and provides retry and logout actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login/logout handling, and persistent identity loading via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and resident data using a backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useResilientActor.ts: Initializes a backend actor with timeout, optional admin setup, and React Query caching for resilient access.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind-based global styles, color variables, dialog overrides, and print-specific formatting.
frontend/src/lib/actorInit.ts: Contains utilities for promise timeouts, error normalization, and detecting non-fatal initialization errors.
frontend/src/lib/assetUrl.ts: Builds normalized asset URLs that respect Vite's base path in development and production.
frontend/src/lib/dateUtils.ts: Provides functions for converting dates to and from nanoseconds, formatting dates, and calculating ages without timezone issues.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the main dashboard UI for viewing, filtering, sorting, and managing residents with various React Query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login screen with Internet Identity authentication and branding UI elements.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentProfile.tsx: Displays a resident’s full profile with data fetching, editing dialogs, medication updates, and error handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-stored parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, shadows, typography, container settings, and plugin extensions.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, architecture, features, and known issues for the assisted living management system.
